title: Smart Todo Manager
prompt:
Create a todo app with:
- Add tasks with categories and due dates
- Mark tasks complete with smooth animations
- Filter by category, status, and date
- Dark theme with purple accents
- Smart suggestions for task categories
- Progress visualization with charts
- Mobile-optimized with swipe actions

result.description: A sophisticated task management app with intelligent categorization and beautiful dark theme

title: Recipe Discovery
prompt:
Build a recipe app featuring:
- Beautiful recipe cards with food photos
- Search by ingredients, cuisine, or diet
- Step-by-step cooking instructions
- Shopping list generation
- Rating and review system
- Warm orange and cream color palette
- Ingredient substitution suggestions

result.description: A comprehensive recipe platform with intelligent ingredient suggestions

title: Expense Tracker Pro
prompt:
Design a personal finance app with:
- Add expenses with categories and receipts
- Monthly budget tracking and alerts
- Visual spending analytics with charts
- Bank account balance monitoring
- Export data to CSV/PDF
- Clean green and white design
- Recurring expense automation

result.description: A complete personal finance solution with advanced analytics

title: Team Project Hub
prompt:
Create a project management tool with:
- Kanban boards with drag-and-drop tasks
- Team member assignment and notifications
- Project timeline and milestone tracking
- File sharing and comments
- Real-time collaboration features
- Professional blue and gray theme
- Mobile-responsive design

result.description: A full-featured project management platform for teams

title: Social Photo Gallery
prompt:
Build a photo sharing app that includes:
- Upload and organize photos in albums
- Like, comment, and share features
- Follow other users and see their feeds
- Advanced photo filters and editing
- Stories that disappear after 24 hours
- Modern Instagram-inspired design
- Mobile-first with touch gestures

result.description: A modern social media platform focused on photo sharing
